
``get_img_minmax``
======================

get_img_minmax

Description
-----------

get_img_minmax

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   get_img_minmax(mg_img, negative_y = TRUE)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``mg_img``
     - magick object
   * - ``negative_y``
     - Map image to negative y spatial values if TRUE during automatic alignment. Meaning that origin is in upper left instead of lower left.
